name: ARCHIVED YouTube Studio + vidIQ Dark
description:
Theme probably will not get any updates, because I am too lazy)). Go and check out https://userstyles.org/styles/188483/youtube-studio-dark-theme. It has more comfortable colors and some bugs, but I hope it's temporarily ^_^

Dark theme for YouTube Studio with vidIQ support and wide screen (both optional)
additional_info:
v.0.1- 10.06.2020
- Rounded corners
- vidIQ extension dark

v.0.2 - 29.06.2020
- Analytics tab completed
- Some color errors fixed
- No changes for vidIQ
- Added opportunity to change header font (with your local font support)

v.0.3 - 03.07.2020
- Dialog fixes
- Color error fix
- No changes for vidIQ

v.0.4 - 14.07.2020
- vidIQ Updates
-- Competitors window
-- All tools on video page
- Some fixes for updates from YT

v.0.4.1 - 15.07.2020
- Upload Window Update
-- Now full dark with monetization dialog support
- Now you can disable vidIQ style

v.0.5 - 20.05.2020
- New popup hints window 

v.0.5.1 - Hotfix - 24.07.2020
- New upload window restyled
- New "new comments" restyled
- Wide Screen Option

v.0.6 - 27.07.2020
- Dark Music tab
- Dark Copyright tab 
- Fixes for CC, Analytics, Comments and some more

v.0.6.1 - Hotfix - 29.07.2020
- Settings popup fix
- Selector padding fix (OMG FINALLY)
- Dashboard fix after Music tab

v.0.6.2 - Minor Fix - 03.08.2020
- Some fixes for new accounts

v.0.6.3 - 13.08.2020
- Inbox copyright claim style

v.0.6.4 - 01.09.2020
- Small fixes for analytics tab
